website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive kickball that has a grippable rubber surface and features an 8.5" diameter for easy play.
pros: Slightly tacky surface that makes it easier to catch this ball
Uses a 2-ply exterior to resist punctures
Classic kickball style with bright red color
Works well for all kinds of games on the playground
cons: Some balls will not fully hold air over time

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a smaller-size kickball
customer_reviews.text: And keep in mind, the proper inflation values for playing kickball are usually a LOT lower than what you'd thing! Don't over-inflate this thing, otherwise it WILL deform VERY easily when you play kickball. The ball should still be pretty soft when you're playing with it-- that allows the rubber to flex and stretch when kicked, rather than the rubber already being stretched when stressed out on a kick.
customer_reviews.author: P. DeCastro

customer_reviews.title: Fun times for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this kickball for my grandchildren. It did not come inflated, and the needle that came with it was wimpy, with only a teeny hole in it. I struggled to inflate it, and gave up. My husband found a better needle, and got it inflated. I think the ball will be fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, but not able to withstand a boxer dog
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this kickball is awesome for normal use. Kids, adults, actual kickball games, four-square etc. However, I have a boxer dog who LOVES to "play ball", and I got it with her in mind. It looked tough. It felt tough. It wasn't strong enough to compete with her teeth & jaws. She punctured it within an hour, though she had lots of fun. It isn't totally destroyed yet, but I doubt it will last past this week.
customer_reviews.author: Fani Limberopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Great kickball, much better than the generic rubber balls ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kickball, much better than the generic rubber balls we could get locally. I personally prefer the WAKA ball, but several of the kids find this one easier to catch.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: I took a chance with this and it looks as good as new after many many hours of use
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many kick/playballs over the years that eventually pop. I took a chance with this and it looks as good as new after many many hours of use!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 36 grandchildren, six great-grandchildren, and counting. Kickball is the on thing they all can play.
customer_reviews.author: D Fields

customer_reviews.title: Horribly misshaped
customer_reviews.text: Kickball is horrible, it is oblong and not completely round. It bounces awkward and will not roll straight. Our first game was cancelled due to weather so I just got to pumping it up. I missed the return window unfortunately. I would look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kickball. I was surprised by the quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kickball. I was surprised by the quality of the rubber. It bounces well and is easy to throw or kick. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Roskowske

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for older kids/adults, but a little big for kids 10 and younger (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED this ball. We used it to play with a group of kids and adults and I have to say it was a little big for the kids to throw, but the adults didnt have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Sorrels

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was good till it hit a sharp point on the fence. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Not Professional Grade
customer_reviews.text: Not professional grade ball at all. I purchased these for a school classroom. One of balls never held air at all. Unfortunately the teacher did not return it to me until 3 days past my return window. I reached out to the seller and they said that their "manufacturer has a certain percent error. It is unfortunate that you received a defective kickball". They went on to say that it was "not their fault". They would not send a replacement out without charging me more money. DO NOT WASTE YOURS. The seller will not stand behind the product, even when they admit that their product was defective.
customer_reviews.author: JAZR

product_meta.title: Kooru Professional Kickball 8.5" Red Kickball
product_meta.description: This 8.5" Red Kooru kickball is a fantastic solution for your kickball, dodge ball, and playground needs. It is 2-ply and made of rubber. Ball comes deflated.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars17 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
